title: LuckPerms怎么给玩家飞行权限
author: konglai55
txt_content: 怎么用LuckPerms给指定玩家飞行权限？？？

replies.author: 天空Craft
replies.txt_content:
基础插件说一下
ess还是其他的
 ess:/lp user ID permission set essentials.fly

replies.author: NINE昭
replies.txt_content: 试试： /lp user <玩家> permission set minecraft.command.fly true

replies.author: zavcb
replies.txt_content: 有人知道如何修改自己游戏内的ID吗

replies.author: 玖忆惜梦
replies.txt_content:
zavcb 发表于 2020-7-22 14:42
有人知道如何修改自己游戏内的ID吗
/nick (id) (名字）

replies.author: Jesenv5
replies.txt_content:
/lp user 玩家id permission set essentials.fly true
这里给的是fly命令权限，不是保持飞行

replies.author: konglai55
replies.txt_content:
梦想与未来 发表于 2020-7-22 14:32
基础插件说一下
ess还是其他的
 ess:/lp user ID permission set essentials.fly
Nucleus 的
